question: their is girl(17 years old) i think her like my own sister. evey time i go thair i kiss her on forehead so advise me

ANSWER

If the girl is a non-Mahram to you, then it is prohibited for you to have any contact with her.

A non-Mahram is literally translated as not prohibited. According to the Shari?ah, it refers to persons with whom marriage is not prohibited. Conversely, a Mahram refers to such persons with whom marriage is prohibited, for example, mother, sister and daughter, etc. If the girl in reference is a person with whom you can marry according to the Shari?ah, then you cannot regard her as your blood sister and have free contact with her. That is prohibited and a major sin.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
